name: Escapenstein Prototype
description:
This is a prototype game made in under two weeks to test a  hook mechanic. Built in MonoGame. Students attending MEAE program at The  University of Utah.

Only tested on Windows 10. Published here 9/8/2018

Controls:

- Mouse Left click hold to shoot hookshot

- Space bar to pull yourself towards towards the anchor point

- Let go of left click to unhook.

- Mouse scroll to zoom in and out

Credits:
